DOC.brief_summary: A multicenter , single arm , post-marketing surveillance study . This study postlicensure requirement Korea Food Drug Administration ( KFDA ) provide continue safety evaluation MenACWY Korean population 2 month 55 year age , receive MenACWY-CRM vaccination accord routine clinical practice prescribe information .
DOC.brief_title: Safety One Dose Meningococcal ACWY Conjugate Vaccine Subjects From 2 Months 55 Years Age Republic South Korea
DOC.criteria: Individuals eligible enrolment study : 1. male female subject 2 month 55 year age time Visit 1 ( include 55 year old subject , one day 56th year birthday ) , schedule receive vaccination MenACWYCRM conjugate vaccine , accord local prescribing information routine clinical practice ; 2. nature study describe subject subject 's parent/legal representative provide write informed consent ; 3. investigator believe subject comply requirement protocol ( e.g. , completion Diary Card ) ; 4. good health determine outcome medical history , physical assessment clinical judgment investigator . 1 . Contraindication , special warning and/or precaution , evaluate investigator , report MenACWYCRM conjugate vaccine Korean prescribing information . In particular , include study subject ever : allergic reaction active substance ingredient study vaccine ; allergic reaction diphtheria toxoid ; illness high fever ; however , mild fever upper respiratory infection ( example cold ) reason delay vaccination .
